short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show related YouTube videos on Yelp! business pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will show related YouTube videos on Yelp! business pages.

It will display a list of youtube videos found about the business place you're viewing. Just click on a video thumbnail and the player will show up and start playing the video.

Easy and fast! :)
